documents.document:
Kehilangan...

Tadi i wrote someting in this blog.. but accidentally put it in the spotlight.. then i can't find it anymore.. huhh leceh tul.. So, i write it again here:

Aku baru kehilangan kerete.. sedihh.. and baru kehilangan "kawan" yg ni lagi sedihh.. well, sad things happen in our life.. and ini antara dugaan Allah.. another few days left untuk kehilangan 2007...

Well its ok.. we start things all over again... just never give up.. im telling this to myself almost everyday.. and dapat one thing yg baru.. age.. not getting older ok... but getting meatured..

so.. Happy New Year.. and Happy New Me...

Menghapus Jejakmu..

"You're in heart like a tatoo.. ill always have you.." these words really touched me.. If you have someone that you have to let him or her go.. just remember they are still stuck in your heart forever..

I got my new car.. yeahoo..

Finally i got my new car...will upload the photo soon hihihi.. tapi insurance untuk my previous stolen Gen2 still tak settle lagi... its almost 3 months nak tunggu the insurance to clear my case.. huhhhh...

2 bulan tunggu untuk case interviewing...(after reminding them so many times)... finally by phone...what a !((&%!&%(! *!)%& TUTTTTT ...the interview from the insurance personnel was only for 5 mins.. and i have to answer all the !&@#!^%!% TUTTT silly questions.. which they suppose to have all the answers from my case report on the day i reported to them..... heeeee..geram jerr..

now still waiting.. waiting..and waiting.. call pun tak guna...i shall get the TUTTT answer.. from the TUTTT personnel..

TUTT.. TUTT.. TUTT... opsss.. cencored...coz to many TUTT word.. hahaha..

I Believe.....

I received an email from a friend today.. in her email she attached a few list of quotes that I Believe its so sweet and meaningful... so, here i took some of it to share with..

I Believe..
That no matter how good a friend is, they're going to hurt you every once in a while and you must forgive them for that..

I Believe..
That just because someone doesn't love you the way you want them to, doesn't mean they don't love you with all they have..

I Believe..
You should always leave your loved ones with loving words. It may be the last time you see them.

I Believe..
That sometimes when I'm angry, I have the right to be angry, but that doesn't give me the right to be cruel..

I Believe..
That its always enough to be forgiven by others. Sometimes you have to learn to forgive yourself..

I Believe..
That the people you care about most in life are taken from you much too soon.

I Believe..
That no matter how bad your heart is broken, the world doesn't stop for your grief..

And... Always Believe.. God loves you everyday..

Cheers.............

Stori mori..

Ok.. saper2 yang baca my blog ni.. and you are the one tgh usaha nak kuruskan badan..atau tgh nak cuba naikkan berat badan.. pls go to this website.. http://www.herbalife2slim.com.

Well, manalah tahu if u nak slim/fit was one of your resolution for this year or last year.. or last last year ..i wish you good luck...

Cekini.

Woman....

Hey all girls.. suppose i post this last 8th of March.. because it was Women's Day.. but it was election day and ppl almost forgot about it... anyway, everyday is women's day.. so here is something that we can share together. And guys.. you can read this to your wife, girlfriend.... and most important is your mum....

A woman has strenghts that amaze men.
She can handle trouble and carry heavy burdens.
She holds happiness, love and opinions.
She smiles when she feels like screaming.
She sings when she feels like crying, cries when she's happy and laughs when she's afraid.
Her love is unconditional!
There's only one this wring with her, she sometimes forgets what she is worth.

Resign...

Lama tak cerita kat my blog ni..since ada org suka baca.. i pun jadi suka nak tulis.. kekeke..perasan cam best la kot my writing nih..

anyway, just handover my resignation letter to my boss last week.. currently im working in a so called big company...TTUUTTTTT...(nama company cencored.. haha). But after working for almost 10 months, i realised choosing big company tak janjikan big career or big opportunity.. tapi lebih kepada its open up ur eyes biggg...terkejut skit tgk some ppl prefer to stay at their comfort level for toooo longg... which is i believe is not good for a company..

So, kepada sesiapa yg kerja berbelas belas tahun in a company, its good u r loyal and u contributed to the growth of the company... tapi kepada yg sekadar pergi kerja..balik kerja...tunggu ujung bulan dapat gaji..kasik kerja lebih skit merungut.. cepat wake up.. the company needs you to grow...

I dont understand.

I dont understand why my previous blog was deleted. Reason given because its inappropriate..
Funny, my writing about how i got in a motorbike accident is inappropriate...

no political issue involved... no adult stories involved..why..why ?? Is it because i wrote the blog in malay..????

Sad...

I just want to say, im sad of what ever happen in Perak now.. Some people just focus on their own interest.. Pray to Allah, things will get better for the people of Perak.. and at the same time for the whole country..

What we want in life ?

Sometimes i do not know what exactly i want in life.

What should i do ?? huhhhh.... tired of being tired...

Lately KAMPAR on the news.

Kampar...just few kilometers away from my hometown..lately was on the news headlines..

1st tragedy involved school kids..it was last week.... that school was my primary school...
and today again on the news.. another tragedy involving UTAR students..and that waterfall is the place i brought my nieces and nephews for picnic..
